# AVExperienceController.Experiences

**Structure**

A structure that represents a collection of experiences to use with an experience controller.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Experiences
```

## Overview

When creating, choose between using [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/Experiences/only(_:)] or [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/Experiences/recommended(excluding:including:)]. Use [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/Experiences/only(_:)] to specify the list of supported experiences. Use [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/Experiences/recommended(excluding:including:)] to include the default set of experiences appropriate for a given platform.

Experiences can be explicitly included or excluded from this list with the corresponding parameters.

## Defining experiences

- **only(_:)**: Returns a set of experiences for the provided list.
- **recommended(excluding:including:)**: Returns the recommended set of experiences.

## Configuring the experience

- **allowedExperiences**: The set of experiences the application supports.
- **availableExperiences**: The allowed experiences that are available to use on the device at this time.
- **experience**: The current experience.
- **AVExperienceController.Experience**: The types of experiences the system supports.
- **configuration**: The configuration options per experience.
- **AVExperienceController.Configuration**: A structure that stores per-experience configuration.

## Conforms To

- Collection
- Sequence
